channel.title: Rbxmk on Anaminus.Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Rbxmk on Anaminus.Blog

item.title: Diagram
item.content:encoded: Yet another out of context diagram.

item.title: Remodel vs rbxmk
item.content:encoded:
If you use Remodel and are interested in rbxmk, I wrote a document comparing the two:

https://github.com/Anaminus/rbxmk/blob/imperative/doc/examples/remodel/README.md

item.title: rbxmk documentation
item.content:encoded: Very excited about how rbxmk documentation is coming together. All of it is compiled with the program, so it can be explored from the terminal. The endgame is to be able to export the entire collection of files to be used for generating a documentation website.

item.title: rbxmk documentation
item.content:encoded:
With this commit, built-in rbxmk documentation is finally readable again. Formatting text is frustrating. There’s lots of comments because I barely know how it works.

https://github.com/Anaminus/rbxmk/commit/857c0dac32b1dbace20ddcb370563f2d0824b16a

I could do a release, but I’m kind of waiting for Go 1.18 to drop.

item.title: RBXM to RBXMX
item.content:encoded:
If you’re having trouble getting rbxmk to covert rbxm to rbxmx correctly, it’s probably to do with Roblox’s API dump missing certain serialized properties. I’ve created a patch file that will add such properties back to the dump.

https://github.com/Anaminus/rbxmk/tree/imperative/doc/examples/dump-patch
